           +----ec.transform.classparser.ConstantNameAndType
public class ConstantNameAndType
extends Constant
An individual constant in the class file constant pool which describes a name and the descriptor for its type.

ConstantNameAndType(DataInputStream)
Build a ConstantNameAndType from a data stream
ConstantNameAndType(int, int)
Build a ConstantNameAndType from a name and type index.

getDescriptorIndex()
Return the type descriptor index.
getNameIndex()
Return the name index.

ConstantNameAndType 
 public ConstantNameAndType(DataInputStream s) throws ClassFormatError, IOException
Build a ConstantNameAndType from a data stream

Parameters:
s - the DataInputStream to parse
ConstantNameAndType 
 public ConstantNameAndType(int aNameIndex,
                            int aDescriptorIndex)
Build a ConstantNameAndType from a name and type index.

Parameters:
aNameIndex - index of a CONSTANT_Utf8 that names a field or method.
aDescriptorIndex - index of a CONSTANT_Utf8 that names a field or method descriptor.

getNameIndex 
 public int getNameIndex()
Return the name index.

Returns:
the index in the constant pool of the Utf8 Constant.
getDescriptorIndex 
 public int getDescriptorIndex()
Return the type descriptor index.

Returns:
the index in the constant pool of the Utf8 Constant.
